text: Galveston Island ( ) is an island on the Texas Gulf Coast in the United States, about southeast of Houston. The entire island, except for Jamaica Beach, is within the city limits of the City of Galveston in Galveston County. ==Other websites== * Galveston Island Convention & Visitors Bureau * Galveston Island State Park Category:Islands of the United States Category:Settlements in Texas
title: Galveston Island
